basics.name: Michael Zhang
basics.headline: Full Stack Developer & DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: Versatile full stack developer with expertise in cloud infrastructure, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines. Passionate about building scalable and resilient systems.

experience.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
experience.description: Leading infrastructure automation and implementing GitOps practices across the organization.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS services.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Built microservices architecture and implemented continuous deployment pipelines.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focus on distributed systems and cloud computing.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Software Engineering
education.description: Graduated with honors. Minor in Mathematics.

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure DevOps Engineer Expert

projects.name: Kubernetes Operator Framework
projects.description: Open-source framework for building Kubernetes operators

projects.name: Infrastructure as Code Templates
projects.description: Collection of Terraform modules for common cloud infrastructure patterns

publications.title: GitOps: The Future of Infrastructure Automation

recommendations.author: Sarah Johnson
recommendations.text: Michael is an exceptional engineer with deep technical knowledge and a talent for simplifying complex systems.

recommendations.author: David Lee
recommendations.text: Working with Michael was a great learning experience. His approach to problem-solving and attention to detail are outstanding.
